price: 87. Ceux-là auront pour rétribution la malédiction d’Allah, des Anges et de l’humanité entière.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ أَنَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ulāika jazāuhum anna ʿalayhim laʿnata al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
